originalText.text: I will rarely give a five star rating but Everlina was really impressive. If anyone is looking For an instructor who is detail, oriented, and really engaging she is the person for you. I felt very at ease after my first lesson. She gave me confidence and it really helped me to relax. I like that she keeps things simple and real. I felt Like she really cared for me as a friend. Thanks to her I passed the first time out:)

originalText.text: Everlena was a fantastic instructor! In a short window of time she was so accommodating and enthusiastically helped my daughter to learn to drive confidently and safely. She was a wonderful communicator, and my daughter enjoyed every single lesson. We also opted for the extra 2 Hour Highway driving which was a success. I can‚Äôt recommend Empire State Driving School and Everlena enough!

originalText.text:
Best Driving School
Everyone was helpful through the process
Big shoutout to Everlina ‚ú®
She is a great instructor
Patient and informative on everything
She will guide you through every step and make sure you do well on your road test.
At the beginning I was terrified of driving, the thought of cars around me gave me a panic üòÇ but with her help I got used to it and the methods she teaches truly help you to be a better driver (safe and responsible üëçüèª)
She can also tell if you need more lessons to be confident in driving, trust her as I did and you won‚Äôt need to worry about a thing :)

originalText.text: Amazing driving school. My instructor was Everlina, she was the nicest, most patient instructor I could have asked her. Without driving experience as a 17 yr old, she got me my license on my first attempt. Couldn't have asked for a better experience learning to drive around the city.

text.text: Amazing driving school. My instructor was Everlina, she was the nicest, most patient instructor I could have asked her. Without driving experience as a 17 yr old, she got me my license on my first attempt. Couldn't have asked for a better experience learning to drive around the city.

originalText.text:
A month ago, I finally set out to get my driver's license, after years of procrastinating. When I stumbled upon Empire State Driving School online and read all the positive reviews, I must admit that I was very skeptical at first. Surely, this couldn't be true, I thought. Well, I decided to take a leap of faith, contacted the school, and requested Everlina as my driving instructor. And I am so glad I did!

Everlina is an extraordinary driving instructor, and just generally an awesome human being! Not only did she make driving concepts simple and manageable, but her kindness and warmth made the learning process truly enjoyable. I am immensely grateful for her guidance!

For anyone embarking on their driving journey, I wholeheartedly recommend Empire State Driving School.
